entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: extend System.Collections.BitArray API #84907
  • Trace Enrichment support #84905
    8.0.0
  • Metrics Enrichment support #84903
    8.0.0
  • ILogger Enrichment support #84902
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json fails to build on .NET Native due to unconstrained raw pointer uses #84895
  • How to implement an Ipv4 and Ipv6 Socket connection? #84893

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: System.Memory's Encoding.GetChars with consumed bytes #84541
  • Cancellation Token is not passed to ReadAsync #84801
  • Why Task.Delay method not allow the ulong data type? #84890

PullRequests

Created

  • Address a couple `TODO-ADDR`s #84906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Baseline two systemic failures in the CoreCLR outerloop pipeline #84904
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [Draft] Limit length of System.Runtime.BigInteger to int.MaxValue-32 bits #84901
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Revert use of raw pointers in System.Text.Json (#78741)" #84899
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Updating XML doc comments for hardware intrinsics to include VEX and EVEX forms #84892
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, arch-avx512

Merged

  • fix a typo #84897
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • Implement IUtf8SpanFormattable on Guid #84553
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization implement locale native functions #84417
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Fix stepping by removing the unnecessary logic in VirtualCallStubManagerManager #84869
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Make `MethodTable` base size access more "typed" #84823
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • AssemblyBuilder.Save add custom attributes handling. #84580
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Disallow `BLK<SIMD>` #84868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • restore the upper vector at the use of GT_FIELD_LIST #84824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create a createdump static library for single-file and native AOT dump generation #84864
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Use ubuntu 22.04 for gcc build #84852
    needs-area-label
  • Private API for RefreshMemoryLimit #83707
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Use `gtNewIndir` in more places #84528
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Deduplicate Binary Integer parsing logic #84582
    area-System.Numerics
  • Generate SslConnectionInfo.Unix.cs with T4 template #84690
    area-System.Net.Security, size-reduction, community-contribution
  • Ascii.Equals and Ascii.EqualsIgnoreCase #84886
    area-System.Text.Encoding, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [ios][wasm] Bump to ICU-72 #84849
    NO-MERGE, area-Build-mono
  • Add binary support to number formatting #84889
    area-System.Runtime
  • Fix async XsdValidatingReader to not use synchronious IO #84888
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
